summary: Build your own ship at the wreck of pride of tel valos
descriptionHtml:
Description:
Build your own ship at the wreck of pride tel valos with storage barrels on deck and a master bedroom the second you walk through that door .

Lore:The east empire company wanted to expand their operations by building a port at the wreck of pride of tel valos but horkers had killed the party in charge of building the massive boat for trading to expand their operations on all corners of the map

What to except in the future:
Other smaller ships
A east empire company trade house
Fishing shack
Recruitable crew
Changed interior
Unique things

Unique items:
The dragonstone heart
Cutlass
Moon Sugar Sack

Lore for dragonstone heart:
A blade with a unknown name peeled the stone from a dragons forehead nobody knows where the
dragon came from but the blade gifted it to the eastempire company.

Requirements:
Hearthfire
Skyrim

And lots of thanks to Darkfox as he taught me how to make house mods
author: MissionToHell
